member.summary: 3D position of the grain.

member.summary: Area in pixels.

member.summary: Yields a copy of this object.

member.name: T:SySal.Tracking.Grain2
member.summary: Grain of a tomographic image

member.name: F:SySal.Tracking.Grain2.Position
member.summary: 2D position of the grain in a layer.

member.name: F:SySal.Tracking.Grain2.Area
member.summary: Area in pixels.

member.name: T:SySal.Tracking.GrainPlane
member.summary: GrainPlane represents a plane of grains all at the same Z level

member.name: F:SySal.Tracking.GrainPlane.Z
member.summary: Depth (Z) coordinate of the plane.

member.name: F:SySal.Tracking.GrainPlane.Grains
member.summary: Grains in the plane.

member.name: T:SySal.Tracking.MIPEmulsionTrackInfo
member.summary: MIPEmulsionTrackInfo stores information about a quasi-vertical track

member.name: F:SySal.Tracking.MIPEmulsionTrackInfo.Field
member.summary: The field of view where the track has been found.

member.name: F:SySal.Tracking.MIPEmulsionTrackInfo.Count
member.summary: The number of grains in the track.

member.name: F:SySal.Tracking.MIPEmulsionTrackInfo.AreaSum
member.summary: Sum of the areas of all grains.

member.name: F:SySal.Tracking.MIPEmulsionTrackInfo.Intercept
member.summary: 3D position of a point on the track trajectory.

member.name: F:SySal.Tracking.MIPEmulsionTrackInfo.Slope
member.summary: 3D slope of the track trajectory.

member.name: F:SySal.Tracking.MIPEmulsionTrackInfo.Sigma
member.summary: Quality of the track, usually expressed as alignment residuals or angular agreement.

member.name: F:SySal.Tracking.MIPEmulsionTrackInfo.TopZ
member.summary: Z of the top grain.

member.name: F:SySal.Tracking.MIPEmulsionTrackInfo.BottomZ
member.summary: Z of the bottom grain.

member.name: M:SySal.Tracking.MIPEmulsionTrackInfo.Clone
member.summary: Yields a copy of this object.

member.name: T:SySal.Tracking.MIPEmulsionTrack
member.summary: MIPEmulsionTrack represents a track made of grains in the emulsion along with its global information

member.name: F:SySal.Tracking.MIPEmulsionTrack.m_Info
member.summary: Member data on which the Info property relies. Can be accessed by derived classes.

member.name: F:SySal.Tracking.MIPEmulsionTrack.m_Grains
member.summary: Member data holding the array of the grains in the track. Can be accessed by derived classes.

member.name: M:SySal.Tracking.MIPEmulsionTrack.#ctor
member.summary: Protected constructor. Prevents users from creating MIPEmulsionTrack objects without deriving the class. Is implicitly called in the constructors of derived classes.

member.name: M:SySal.Tracking.MIPEmulsionTrack.AccessGrains(SySal.Tracking.MIPEmulsionTrack)
member.summary: Protected accessor for quick access to the grain array. Can be used by derived classes.

member.name: M:SySal.Tracking.MIPEmulsionTrack.AccessInfo(SySal.Tracking.MIPEmulsionTrack)
member.summary: Protected accessor for quick access to the track info. Can be used by derived classes.

member.name: P:SySal.Tracking.MIPEmulsionTrack.Info
member.summary: Retrieves global information about the track.

member.name: P:SySal.Tracking.MIPEmulsionTrack.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Accesses grains in an array-like fashion.

member.name: P:SySal.Tracking.MIPEmulsionTrack.Length
member.summary: Returns the number of grains in the track.

member.name: T:SySal.Tracking.IMIPTracker
member.summary: Tracker objects receive grains and retrieve tracks

member.name: M:SySal.Tracking.IMIPTracker.FindTracks(SySal.Tracking.GrainPlane[])
member.summary: Finds tracks as grain sequences.

member.name: P:SySal.Tracking.IMIPTracker.TrackingArea
member.summary: Area where the tracker is supposed to operate.

member.name: T:SySal.Tracking.DistortionCorrection
member.summary: Distortion correction.

member.name: F:SySal.Tracking.DistortionCorrection.Order
member.summary: Order of the correction.

member.name: F:SySal.Tracking.DistortionCorrection.Coefficients
member.summary: Coefficients of the correction.

member.name: F:SySal.Tracking.DistortionCorrection.Shrinkage
member.summary: Shrinkage factor.

member.name: F:SySal.Tracking.DistortionCorrection.ZBaseSurface
member.summary: Z of the emulsion surface in contact with the plastic base of the plate.

member.name: F:SySal.Tracking.DistortionCorrection.ZExternalSurface
member.summary: Z of the outer surface of the emulsion layer.

member.name: M:SySal.Tracking.DistortionCorrection.Correct(SySal.Tracking.Grain[])
member.summary: Corrects the grain positions using known distortion information.

member.name: M:SySal.Tracking.DistortionCorrection.#ctor(System.UInt32,SySal.BasicTypes.Vector2[],System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Protected constructor. Can only be called by derived classes. Users must derive a class from DistortionCorrection in order to use it.

member.name: T:SySal.Tracking.IMIPPostProcessor
member.summary: Performs post-tracking processing such as track fitting, distortion correction, unshrinking, etc.

member.name: M:SySal.Tracking.IMIPPostProcessor.Process(SySal.Tracking.Grain[][],System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Processes the grain sequences supplied, optionally corrects them, and computes the geometrical parameters of each track.

member.name: P:SySal.Tracking.IMIPPostProcessor.DistortionInfo
member.summary: Retrieves the DistortionCorrection the PostProcessor used to correct the grains.
